Name: Finger is 300 bugs
About the game: 'Finger is 300 bugs' is an exciting wave game where you have to fight hordes of bloodthirsty beetles trying to steal your breakfast. In the game, you need to press, click, and destroy insects approaching from different directions. Your opponents will be ants, cockroaches, caterpillars, and other terrifying insects. To protect yourself from them, you will have access to various tools such as boxes and traps, as well as special moves including pokes, punches, and slaps. Your main goal is to survive as long as possible and prevent insects from reaching your belongings. The game allows you to improve your skills and strengthen your defense to become more effective in the battle against insects. Key features of the game: Exciting wave game Destroy bloodthirsty insects attacking your breakfast Various types of insect opponents Use boxes, traps, and moves for defense Improve your skills and strengthen defense to survive as long as possible.
